description: This table extracts the related multiple response Dental: Associated Diagnoses History (I RES 17519) item.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the finding record

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the historical instant in the dental procedure record. Together with FINDING_ID, this forms the foreign key to the DENTAL_RES_DX_HX table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple�diagnoses�associated with the�procedure�and the�historical instant�from the DENTAL_RES_DX_HX�table

columns.name: DENTAL_DX_HX_ID
columns.description: Stores the history of the associated diagnoses for a dental procedure
